attributes.review: Pretty sure this app is cursed and will summon a demon into your home. But don’t worry it gave me its name once it beat the living heck out of me. It was Donald Trump Jr. the entire time and he’ll haunt you until you say your going to vote for his Cheeto Puff father. Anyways, it’s so nice to have my life back now. Do not download this app if you want to keep your house demon and Cheeto free.
attributes.title: 🧚🏻✨🌟this app actually ruined my life🧚🏻✨🌟

attributes.review: As a trump supporter. I thought I was gonna love this app, to keep me updated with the latest news, rallies. Unfortunately this app crashes all the time when I want to open it up. What’s even worst is as soon I opened the app I saw an Orange monkey .. how could they? Scared the crap out of me!! 😡😡😡😡😡😡 is that how you welcome a trump supporter? Anyways DONT WASTE YOUR TIME DOWNLOADING THIS PIECE OF CRAP.. IT WILL CRASH!!! No matter what you do ..
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: Immediately made my phone crash and I think it might have even given me a virus! An extremely horrible experience would not recommend this app at all. With how its stats are looking right now it seems like it’s soon going to be deleted from the App Store and no one will be able to download it... what a shame ☕️
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and when i opened it my phone turned on and off straight for 17 minutes. Then when that stopped I got 12 death threats through the app. This app is so scary I would rather stub each of my 13 toes individually while simultaneously getting my pinky finger smashed with a hammer and also being beaten by my father. This app is as horrible as President Orange himself.

When I opened the app I saw a lot of words it hurt my brain all the words I sail where like small like how is this an app and plus when u opened the app I saw words words like he wants to take down TikTok and tik tok doesn’t have so many words like I want to enjoy summer without words like words are words and words love each other
attributes.title: Sucky.                                                    Words

attributes.review: So I couldn’t even make it towards adding my phone number because there was the Cheeto with a face on it pretending to wave🙀😾other than that this took me a billion years to download, or however many years Donald Trump has been alive for🧚‍♀️👽, take it off the App Store NOW, it has caused me not only emotional, but mental and physical trauma🙀🤬. In other words tell this Cheeto, to NOT genZ🔪😼
attributes.title: Worst App on here!🔪🙈🤡

attributes.review: When I opened the app it wouldn’t stop showing a picture of some orange homophobic racist and not only that it broke my phone the second I downloaded the app which took almost 38 weeks my phone started to glitch and was opening all my other app overall this app is absolutely terrible and you shouldn’t get it
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I was excited to get more information on rallies for our president 😍🇱🇷but as soon as I opened the app it asked for my credit card information 😡😡 why do I need to provide that??? I already pay taxes to the president. On top of that it took several days to download and I had to delete all of my apps/pictures to free up room to keep the app.    🤬🤬🤬🤯🇱🇷🤬😡
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this app is worse than bad! it's so bad that it scammed me!! all my money is gone now!!! please DONT get this app it is so horrible and doesn't deserve to be on the app store with all the other apps!!!! if you're reading this, TAKE IT DOWN NOW!!! the second i open the app our orange mac n cheese orangutan baldheaded clown who calls himself our president sent THE POLICE TO MY HOUSE!!! don't get this app or YOULL BE IN JAIL!!! my bail was A MILLION DOLLARS!!! I WAS TRAUMATIZED BY THE HYPOCRISY!!! DONT VOTE FOR TRUMP HES A SCAM!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: The founding fathers of the United States did not create our political system for a racist, homophobic, sexist, fascist man to become the president of the United States. This app is his way of connecting with the younger, more technological generation but unfortunately for him the younger generation is appalled by the immoral and unethical behavior he exhibits every day. Not to mention his ignorant policies. Gen Z was brought into a dying world and we are here to fix it. Vote Blue 2020
attributes.title: TERRIBLE, No Good, Offensive
